original: <color=#faffa3ff>《雪梅》盧梅坡梅雪爭春未肯降，騷人擱筆費評章。梅須遜雪三分白，雪卻輸梅一段香。</color><color=#ff0000ff>想要執行季內政嗎？</color>
text: <color=#faffa3ff> "Snow Plum" Lu Meipo and Mei Xue did not want to come down, so Sao Ren put aside the fee for reviewing. Mei Xu Xunxue is three points white, but Xue loses Mei for a while. </color><color=#ff0000ff>Do you want to carry out the internal affairs of the quarter? </color>
